item.title: Wedding Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented and creative Video Editor to craft a memorable wedding video for a beautiful destination wedding held in Mexico. The ideal candidate will seamlessly blend video footage and photos from the wedding day to create a stunning visual story that captures the magic and emotions of the event.

Responsibilities:

*Review and organize video footage and photos from the wedding day
*Edit and compile video clips to create a cohesive and engaging wedding video
*Incorporate photos into the video, ensuring a seamless integration with video footage
*Add music, transitions, and effects to enhance the overall viewing experience
*Ensure the final video meets quality standards and client expectations

Deliverables:

A full-length wedding video (approximately 20-30 minutes)
A highlight reel (3-5 minutes) showcasing key moments
Two rounds of revisions based on client feedback
High-resolution digital files of the final videos
A digital photo album/slideshow integrated within the video

Qualifications:

Proven experience in video editing, specifically wedding or event videos
Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
Strong storytelling skills through visual media
Ability to work within deadlines and manage multiple tasks efficiently
Excellent communication skills and attention to detail

If available, please share a link to your previous wedding or event video editing work.

We look forward to seeing your creativity and helping us preserve these special memories!



Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 05:21 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Photo Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Photo Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
